CustomField.formula: IF ( $Setup.DMMAX__DIESetting__c.DMMAX__Disable_Phase_Trigger__c , false, IF ( ISPICKVAL(DMMAX__GEN_Phase__c, 'Closed') && DMMAX__Probability_Phase__c != 'Closed', true, IF ( ISPICKVAL(DMMAX__GEN_Phase__c, 'Early') && DMMAX__Probability_Phase__c != 'Early', true, IF ( ISPICKVAL(DMMAX__GEN_Phase__c, 'Mid') && DMMAX__Probability_Phase__c != 'Mid', true, IF ( ISPICKVAL(DMMAX__GEN_Phase__c, 'Late') && DMMAX__Probability_Phase__c != 'Late', true, false)))))
CustomField.label: IsDirty
